tei:transcription.tei:p: Handwritten letter from Cotta to Schenker, dated January 27, 1906 = CA 11| Cotta’s carbon copy.
Herrn D<sup>r.</sup> Heinrich Schenker Wien III. Reisnerstr. 38.
Wir beehren uns, Ihnen die höfliche Mitteilung zu machen, daß in dem Manuskript Ihres Buches ”<iemPhantasien und Theorien” die folgenden Notenbeispiele fehlen:

08.987 Brahms op.62 N<sup>r.</sup>7.| In the main copy, all but the final two items in this list have been crossed through, probably by Schenker; in the carbon copy, they are not crossed through. “ .988 Brahms, Liebeslieder Walzer No: [ ] amoll “ .996 Walküre II Akt 1 Scene “ .997 Chopin op.41 Nr.1 Mazurka 09.000 Schumann op.11 Sonate fismoll “ .016 Mozart, Streichquartett I Satz C dur {2} 09.018 Mozart, Streichquartett C dur Andante “ .035 Berlioz Symphonie phantastique Payne Ausg. Nr. 22 S.156 “ .155 Bach, Matth. Passion Aria. Part. S.30 T.1–12 “ .156 [Bach, Matth. Passion] Part. S.168 T.1–4 “ .379a. Bach, Fuge Cismoll

Wollen Sie die Güte haben, uns dieselben baldigst zu senden, damit der Satz schellstens fertiggestellt worden kann. – Sollten Sie zur Feststellung der Beispiele des Manuskriptes bedürfen, bitten wir um freundliche umgehende Nachricht, wir werden Ihnen dann die betreffenden Seiten übersenden.
Mit vorzüglicher Hochachtung Ihre sehr ergebener [signed:] J. G. Cottasche Buchhandlung Nachf.

tei:translation.tei:p: Handwritten letter from Cotta to Schenker, dated January 27, 1906 = CA 11|
Dr. Heinrich Schenker Vienna III. Reisnerstraße 38
We have the honor of informing you that the following music examples are lacking in the manuscript of your book “Fantasies and Theories”:

08.987 Brahms Op.62 N0.7. [=Fig. 57] " .988 Brahms, Liebeslieder Walzer No: [ ] in A minor [=?] " .996 Walküre, Act II Scene 1 [=Fig. 58] " .997 Chopin, Mazurka, Op.41 No.1 [=Fig. 60] 09.000 Schumann, Sonata in F# minor, Op.11 [=Fig. 61] " .016 Mozart, String Quartet in C major, mvt 1 [=Fig. 89] {2} " .018 Mozart, String Quartet in C major, Andante [=??] " .035 Berlioz, Symphonie fantastique, Payne edn., No. 22, p.156 [=Fig. 102] " .155 Bach, St. Matthew Passion, Aria, score p.30, bars 1–12 [=Fig. 176] " .156 [Bach, St. Matthew Passion], score p.168, bars 1–4 [=Fig. 177] " .379a. Bach, Fugue in C# minor [=Fig. 258]

Please would you be so kind as to send us these at the earliest opportunity, so that the setting can be completed as quickly as possible[?] – Should you have need of the manuscript in order to complete the examples, we ask you kindly to let us know by return, [and] we will then send over to you the pages in question.
With kind regards, Yours very truly, [signed:] Heirs of J. G. Cotta’s Bookdealership
